title: Enabling Contextual Memory for the Amazon Pharmacy AI Assistant
summary: Led end-to-end development of multi-turn conversational memory for the Amazon Pharmacy AI Assistant, reducing human support contacts by 8%.

title: Improving Price Visibility for Customers Facing 'Refill Too Soon' Rejections
summary: Spearheaded a CX improvement from ideation to launch resulting in a 23% increase in price visibility. Built the API and CX foundation for decoupling insurance price from availability of that price.

title: Launching PillPack on Amazon Pharmacy
summary: Contributed to the PillPack on Amazon Pharmacy MVP, then led the delivery of the GA launch which expanded access to Medicaid and Medicare customers.

title: Building the 'Lean In' App from Scratch in Spain
summary: Collaborated with leaders from Dribba and the Lean In Foundation to create a mobile app companion for Lean In's conference.
